name: Grav Designator, Crewed, Disposable (DGrDC-13)
description: The grav designator projects a gravitic effect to mark a target for attack. The rapid gravitic pushing and pulling reduces internal structural strength in objects and induces organic damage in beings. This version is constructed of relatively inexpensive materials and has a working lifetime measured in days.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
